title: Carry The Glass
description:
As two construction workers, you are transporting a glass window for a skyscraper . On this journey you have to be careful with the glass because it is very fragile . Can you make it to the top of the skyscraper without breaking it? Multiplayer: Get help from a friend to carry the glass Invite a trusted friend to your lobby to carry the glass with you The Legend of Heroes: Trails through Daybreak II
Characters with physics We’ve added physics to every part of the characters to improve the gameplay. Game Modes: Easy, Hard (no checkpoints) If you want a more casual experience, you should try easy mode. But if you believe you can make it to the top without breaking the glass, then hard mode might be for you
